en.title: Tips for Cats and Dogs Living Together | A Step-by-Step Introduction Guide
en.content:
It is entirely possible to keep cats and dogs together. With proper introduction and the right environment, different species can learn to coexist harmoniously.

Gradual Introduction Is the Key to Success

Never let them meet face-to-face on the first day. Follow these stages: Stage 1 — Keep them in separate rooms and swap towels with each other\'s scent (3–5 days). Stage 2 — Let them sense each other\'s presence through a closed door; feed them on opposite sides of the door (3–5 days). Stage 3 — Allow them to see each other through a baby gate (several days to 1 week). Stage 4 — Short supervised face-to-face meetings with the dog on a leash (gradually increase the duration).

Dog Breeds That Get Along Well with Cats

Calm-natured breeds such as Cavalier King Charles Spaniels, Golden Retrievers, Pugs, and Maltese tend to do well. Terrier breeds and sighthounds have strong prey drive and require extra caution.

Siberians\' Compatibility with Dogs

Siberians are so sociable they are often called "dog-like cats," and they tend to build friendly relationships with dogs easily. Their curious and fearless nature works in their favor when living with other species.

zh.title: 猫狗同居的秘诀 | 和谐共处的分阶段引导法
zh.content:
猫和狗一起养是完全可行的。通过适当的引导和环境营造，不同动物之间也能和谐相处。

分阶段引导是成功的关键

第一天就让它们直接见面是大忌。请按以下步骤进行：第1阶段——让它们待在不同的房间，交换带有彼此气味的毛巾（3~5天）。第2阶段——隔着门让它们感受对方的存在，在门的两侧喂食（3~5天）。第3阶段——隔着婴儿门让它们见面（数天~1周）。第4阶段——给狗拴上牵引绳，短时间面对面接触（逐渐延长时间）。

与猫相处融洽的犬种

性格温和的犬种如骑士查理王猎犬、金毛寻回犬、巴哥犬、马尔济斯等比较合适。梗犬类和视觉猎犬类追猎本能较强，需要特别注意。

西伯利亚猫与狗的相处

西伯利亚猫社交能力很强，被称为"像狗一样的猫"，容易与狗建立友好关系。它们好奇心旺盛、不怕生的性格在与其他动物共处时是一大优势。
